title: 2025 SkS Weekly Climate Change & Global Warming News Roundup #13
description:
A listing of 31 news and opinion articles we found interesting and shared on social media during the past week: Sun, March 23, 2025 thru Sat, March 29, 2025.
This week's roundup is again published by category and sorted by number of articles included in each.…

description: Having the support of family members living in a foreign country was one of the reasons Nigerian women gave for choosing to have their babies overseas.
